job.title: Senior Network Engineer
job.description: pLeading Financial Industry Client perennially recognized by Forbes WSJ and others as one of Americas best employers seeks highly qualified Senior Network Engineer with significant experience in the design installation configuration integration and automation of firewalls switches routers fabrics and other data center technologies strongThis is a FULLTIME career opportunity and NO SPONSORSHIP is available strongppstrongnbspstrongppstrongBasic QualificationsstrongpulliRequires a technical BS degree and 8  12 years of prior relevant experience or Masters with 6  10 years of prior relevant experienceliliSenior Level Network and Firewall AdministrationEngineer knowledge Palo Alto Cisco etcliliMust have network and firewall engineering experience with designing implementation and maintaining Layer 2 and 3 networking devices andor firewall devices such as Juniper Dell Cisco Fortinet or Palo AltoliliWorking knowledge of network features and protocolsliliSystemNetwork Monitoring experienceliulpstrongnbspstrongppstrongDesired QualificationsstrongpulliNext Generation Firewall NGFW experience CISCO Palo Alto etcliliNetwork Terminal Access Point TAP experienceliliIDPIPSDPI experience Host BasedNetwork BasedNGFWliliNetwork CertificationsliliCisco CCNA or higherliliPalo Alto PCNSA or higherliliKnowledge of networking infrastructure suppliers and service offerings including Cisco Fortigate Force10 Dell PowerConnect F5 Networks Juniper Checkpoint Palo AltoliliFamiliarity with task automationliliFamiliarity in remote administration SCCM SSLVPN SSH Remote DesktopliliMust be able to work collaboratively with other system administrators system engineers and network engineers in a team environmentliulpbrppThis is a full time direct hire position offering career advancement top notch medical competitive compensation with a pension and many more tangible benefitsppp
